name: A Year
description:
A Year is a game made during Ludum Dare 47 during a 3 day period.  The theme was stuck in a loop.

A Year is a text based colony builder where you are stuck in a time loop that spans a year. The goal is to grow your settlement and armed forces strong enough to defeat the person responsible for the time loop and  thus breaking it.

Features

  • Manage your population, decide how many settlers should be farmers, artisans, builders and soldiers.
  • If the year reaches it’s end or the population reaches 0 the year starts over and plays out exactly the same.
  • Change the focus of your workers, have the artisans make more arms instead of tools and make you soldiers more professional and more expensive.
  • Events will occur every week, both to your gain and your loss.
  • Choices has to made, save some slaves, attack an outpost or trade with a merchant.
  • Grow you army, defend against bandits and battle entire armies.

Everything except the sound is made by me.

Sound is from https://www.zapsplat.com/
